storage.title: What items to store?
storage.subtitle: Select which items you wish to store. Each item has a fixed monthly price. We'll keep 'em safe!

pricingInfo.title: Storage Pricing Information
pricingInfo.fixedMonthlyPrice: Fixed Monthly Price: Each item has a fixed monthly storage price
pricingInfo.allWarehouses: All Warehouses: Unified pricing across all locations
pricingInfo.noVolumeCalculation: No Volume Calculation: Prices based on item type, not volume

moving.title: What items to move?
moving.subtitle: Select which items you wish to move to your new home. We'll handle everything for you!
moving.serviceDescription: Pickup and delivery services are charged separately at ${rate}/hour (2 people included, minimum 2 hours)

pricingInfo.title: Pricing Information
pricingInfo.intercityMoving: Intercity Moving: Charged per pallet (1 pallet = 2 m³)
pricingInfo.localServices: Local Services: ${rate}/hour (2 people included, minimum 2 hours)
pricingInfo.palletizingFee: Palletizing Fee: Included in intercity pricing

localMoving.title: Local Moving Service
localMoving.subtitle: Professional local moving service with flexible hourly rates. Perfect for same-city relocations.

calculator.title: Price Calculator
calculator.standardArea: Greater Vancouver Central Area (Vancouver, Richmond, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Delta, Surrey), Calgary, Winnipeg
calculator.premiumArea: Greater Vancouver Outer Area (North Van, West Van, White Rock, Langley, Maple Ridge)
calculator.withVehicle: With Moving Company Vehicle (1 person + vehicle)

localMoving.contactUs: Contact us to schedule your local moving service

movingService.title: Choose Moving Service
movingService.subtitle: Please select the type of moving service you need
movingService.localDescription: Same city moving service with professional manpower
movingService.intercityDescription: Cross-province moving with full service package

footer.description: Professional moving company dedicated to providing safe, efficient, and caring moving experiences. We have an experienced team and advanced equipment to ensure your belongings receive the best protection during transportation.

admin.title: Admin Console
admin.subtitle: Manage website configuration and pricing settings

pricing.intercityDesc: Manage pricing table for intercity moving

pricing.storageDesc: Manage storage prices for different items

pricing.resetSuccess: Prices have been reset to default values!

items.title: Items Management
items.description: Manage furniture types and volume multipliers
